name: Forest Fires in Brazil
data_intro: This dataset report of the number of forest fires in Brazil divided by states. The series comprises the period of approximately 10 years (1998 to 2017). The data were obtained from the official website of the Brazilian government.

cat_feature_intro.state: The legal Amazon comprises the states of Acre, Amapá, Pará, Amazonas, Rondonia, Roraima, and part of Mato Grosso, Tocantins, and Maranhão.

num_feature_intro.year: With this data, it is possible to assess the evolution of fires over the years as well as the regions where they were concentrated.
num_feature_intro.number: This dataset report of the number of forest fires in Brazil divided by states. The series comprises the period of approximately 10 years (1998 to 2017). The data were obtained from the official website of the Brazilian government.
